Class HangmanFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • HangmanFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class HangmanFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class deals with mostly just the UI elements of the program. The many components of the interface for the user are initialized and updated in this class as the game goes on.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Located in the center of the frame, used for directions

      The UI's HangmanGame object
      private boolean gameStart

      private javax.swing.JLabel guesses
      The JLabel showing the number of wrong guesses the player has until the game is over

      The JLabel that shows hangman aspect of the interface, with underlines for letters that have not been guessed
      private javax.swing.JLabel incorrect
      The JLabel showing the incorrect letters that have already been guessed

      Where the word to be guessed is inputted and where letters are inputted
